title: Probability of getting hostel
content:
Fresher here
What is the probability that I will get a hostel room and apparently my waiting list is 71 and please also recommend me pgs for boys too unisex also works..thanks in advance.

comments.body: Huh?? There's a waiting list for hostel?
How did you get a "not official" waiting number of 71 then?
are the rules for EC campus hostel really meant to be followed cuz tf you mean i need warden permission to use laptop and devices in my room. Is this a jail or a hostel ffs
Nah dude. Dw. The rules are nonsense, do what you wish to. The only rule they enforce is the curfew.
Hii..offtopic but is PESU like school maintain a notebook or they cut internals type?

Oh, what time does the curfew start because in the rules they said 7pm but if I want to play football in the college at around that time can I go? 
And also are the professors chill if I want to make notes on my tab during classes?
No clue about curfew times, I wasn't in hostel. Ask on discord. And note-taking depends on the prof - some allow, some don't.
No, but they can find ways to cut internal marks in other ways.
Is there any need to make a notebook for a cse student can't we use laptops ?
From what I've heard no college allows laptops from first year to the classes. Laptops are mainly used during later years
I asked the warden and he said there are 70 people in front of us
Guys I am sorry if the post is misleading regards to the waiting list all I meant to say was there were 70 parents ahead of us
